title: Thursday Post Show (12-16-21)
itunes:title: Thursday Post Show (12-16-21)
description:
Bobby starts by telling everyone that some people have guesses correct on his Instagram contest. We take a call from Listener T-DUB who wants to know how Mike D knows so much about Bobby. Phone Screener Abby said that one of our stations in Florida played her version of the National Anthem. We talk to Dave Parker if it’s true or not. Eddie talks about how he’s exhausted helping his son study.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
